ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
ygData.msgSnippet: From my visit to KK...., Phinny and his 4 guardians are extremely MR so apart from wizard lures, the other casters can do absoutely nothing. You will need at
ygData.messageBody:
From my visit to KK...., Phinny and his 4 guardians are extremely MR so
apart from wizard lures, the other casters can do absoutely nothing. You
will need at least 3 groups, preferbly with 1 cleric, 1 chanter , 1 evaccer
and the rest tanks per group. It takes a HIGH 50 char to single pull the
guardians. or else you will get all 4 guardians and phinny. Good luck.
----- Original Message -----
From: "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...>
To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'" <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 27, 2001 9:24 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.


> Just to make some noise here: Need tips to kill PA in Kedge Keep with 1
> team:
>
> 1. What is the best combo of this team, average lvl?
> 2. Is the eye pulling method a bannable offence (ie use eye spell to pull
> PA to zone in).
> 3. Alternatively is to invis all the way to ledge, how siong is it to kill
> the 4 SS, guardians and PA?
> 4. Anything to watch out when fighting PA and its kakis?
> 5. I thinking of parking a druid at KK zone in, with max 125 tracking
> skill, I wonder if he can track PA from zone in or have to swim deeper to
> track? Is it true that all mobs in KK cannot see invis except guardians
> and PA? Is there any safe room near PA where I can invis a druid and park
> there to check if PA is up? If k, then it's better to track 1st then call
> grp than the other way round.
>
> Thx.
>
>
> Zil.
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List

>
>
